title: 24/7 Emergency Maintenance, Clubhouse with Lounge and Billiards
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 660 Sq.
Discover the beauty of Norwalk Metropointe.
Conveniently located in the heart of Norwalk, our upgraded 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartment homes are surrounded by lush landscaping and beautifully maintained grounds.
You'll love your central Norwalk location with easy access to major freeways, Metro Link (Yellow Line), Metro Bus Line, and the Norwalk Community Transit, commuting has never been easier.
We're minutes from major shopping centers including Stonewood Mall, Cerritos Towne Center, and Lakewood Mall.
Enjoy the convenience of being close to great restaurants, grocery stores, Norwalk AMC Theater, local colleges and universities, and we're within the Norwalk/La Mirada school district.
Live up to your expectations, come home to Norwalk Metropointe.

Granite Inspired Countertops, Hardwood Floors, Walk-In Closets, Gourmet Kitchen With Appliances, Central Heat & Air, Gas Fireplace, Heating, Ceiling Fans, Cherry Cabinetry, Upgraded Fixtures & Hardware, Gated Access, Air Conditioning, Vaulted Ceilings

BBQ Area, Balcony Or Patio, Controlled Access, 18 On-Site Laundry Facilities, Storage Available, Racquetball Court, 24/7 Emergency Maintenance, Clubhouse with Lounge and Billiards, Storage Space, Swimming Pool, Fitness Center, Pool, Spa, Recess lighting, Online Resident Services, Basketball Court
Pet Deposit: $500 (for up to 2 pets); Pet Rent: $50 Per Month, Per Pet; Maximum 2 pets; No Weight Restriction; Certain Breed Restrictions Apply
